MOT1: You can't wait until you're perfect to begin something good. - Abbé Pierre.
MOT2: I've decided to be happy because it's good for my health. - Voltaire
MOT3: Success isn't key to happiness. Happiness isn't key to success. If you enjoy what you do, you'll succeed. - Albert Schweitzer
MOT4: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm. - Winston Churchill
MOT5: Winners find ways, losers find excuses. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
MOT6: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen. - Michael Jordan
MOT7: That's what I tell myself every morning, I'm gonna work 4 times harder to be 4 times better than them. - Wil Aime.
MOT8: Everyone's a genius. But if you judge a fish on it's capcity to climb a tree, it'll pass it's whole life thinking it's stupid. - Albert Einstein
MOT9: I'm grateful to everyone who's told me no. It's thanks to them that I'm myself. - Albert Einstein
MOT10: Be yourself, everybody else is already taken. -  Oscar Wilde
MOT11: In twenty years, you'll be more disappointed by the things you haven't done than by those you have done. So step off your path. Set sail. Explore. Dream. Discover. - Mark Twain
MOT12: The most important things in the world were accomplished by people who continued to try when there seemed to be no hope. - Dale Carnegie
MOT13: To succeed, remember these three things: to see is to know, to know is to be capable, to try is to have. - Alfred de Musset
MOT14: A pessimist sees the difficulties in each opportunity, an optimist sees the opportunities in each difficulty. - Winston Churchill
MOT15: Believe in your dreams and they might come true. Believe in yourself and they will come true. - Martin Luther King
MOT16: To succeed, your desire to succeed must outweigh your fear to fail. - Bill Cosby
MOT17: If today you don't do what your head is telling you to do, tomorrow, you'll find what your head told you in your ass. - Coluche
MOT18: The future's doors are open to those willing to open them. - Coluche
MOT19: Shooting for the stars doesn't scare me ! - Amel Bent
MOT20: If you think that you're not worth a lot, you'll never find someone to up your worth. - Michael Aguilar
